comments: First impression of class was bad. Took as 1st semester freshmen. Decided to stick with the class and ended up being the right choice. Gives random extra credit on things like attendance etc. Hard to understand at first but you get used to it. Love his terrible sense of humor. Read the book a lot and LOTS of quizzes which are hard. Worth taking.

Absolutely awful. You can barely understand him, he rambles off things that don\'t even pertain to the class, and he told us a day in advance that we had two projects due and a big exam on three chapters.

Even though the class is very difficult, if you go to his office hours he is always willing to help and boost your grade. He gives you extra points on tests and quizzes even if you get the answer completely wrong.

Mr. Nowduri is a very helpful, kind and amazing professor. I had an amazing year with him and he is my favourite teacher in the entire university. Anything he teaches, even the most confusing topic will become understandable after his great lectures.

This professor is terrible. All test/quizzes are online. He doesn\'t know how to spell, so you get an answer wrong cause HE can\'t spell correctly. He says his tests are "grade busters" but everyone fails. He does NOT teach. He makes a PP and doesn\'t even finish it all. Quizzes every-other day. Overall. +doesnt grade anything till end of semester.
Soo boring. I cant stand his lectures. Read the book. Most of the quizzes are short answer.

Very nice man, cant really understand his accent, all he wants us to do is look at book, skips over powerpoints a lot, no one is passing his quizes, since he doesnt go over the info we have in the powerpoints.

everything is done through BOLT. quizzes, tests, projects. really easy class, just have to look over the text. always attempt short answer, he usually gives full credit. study the quizzes once you\'re done with them and you\'ll do great! he\'s always willing to help, you just need to make the effort!
Quiz every week and project if you review slides you will be fine. He lets you make up quizs if u meet him in the library and gives an extra credit assignment
He\'s awesome! I loved him read the chapters and you\'ll do fine! My best professor ever

Talks about abstract concepts for a computer class...Quiz for each chapter, test for every 3, often unannounced. Doesn\'t matter what you study he will choose some small minor detail from book for his questions. Will spend 20 min talking about unrelated topic and skip through 6 slides in a minute. Class is required for most so good luck :/
best pro in the world so funny

He can be funny if you can understand his jokes but he is indeed hard to understand. He has quizzes almost every other day and there are about 30 random questions from all over the chapter. Not only main points. Since all test are on the computer, it grades you pretty harshly. Helpful at library though but overall unless you can memorize good luck.

Think he is a fair teacher.I agree that he is one of the hardest teachers I have had so far but all he asks is for you to study. I have a 82 avg and he has a test every week on a new chapter. All you do is read that chapter and you should do fine. I also think he crueves everyones grade at the end of the semester d is in the lib every day for help.

"do you get my point, my dears?" NO WE DON\'T GET YOUR POINT! nowduri is so hard to understand with his accent. tests and quizzes are on the computer and are so difficult. i walked out of that class everyday shaking my head about how ridiculous it is. he tries hard and is a nice guy but doesn\'t know how to dumb himself down at all.

hes a very hard teacher, his quizzes are ridiculous. However, if you do the work on the projects and finish then within he class period, he add extra credit. becuase his class is so hard he adds a lot of bonus points.

He is a very nice PERSON but an AWFUL PROF! He is difficult to understand and he gives random tests and quizes without announcing them!TESTS without and warning! He doesn\'t understand what he teaches and gets mad when you don\'t understand. He treats intro to info tech like your major is computer science and you should know everything about it.SUCKS

This guy is the worst professor i have ever encounted. he is a complete joke he has no idea what he is talking about you cant understand him at all.he goes through 60 slides a day and expects you to understand all that he is teaching.dont dare as him for help cause you have a better chance of getting an answer out of the chair you are sitting in

I almost feel bad giving a poor comment with all the others on here, but theres no way around it. Teacher relies solely on automated quizes/ tests on which he gives you no breaks for minimally wrong answers. If you have a concern about your grade, he is impossible to talk to. Overall, avoid at all costs, nice guy but awful teacher.

STAY FAR FAR FAR AWAY. I can\'t even explain enough how hard he is to communicate to in and outside the class. Even getting help from him twice a week does not help understand or do well in his class. I can not believe he has a job.
